title: Technology Radar
description: Our assessment of technologies, tools, and techniques that we find interesting.

rings.name: Adopt
rings.description: Technologies we think you should seriously consider using.

rings.name: Trial
rings.description: Technologies that are ready for use, but not as completely proven as those in the Adopt ring.

rings.name: Assess
rings.description: Technologies to look at closely, but not necessarily trial yet.

dimensions.name: Methods & Patterns
dimensions.description: Key software development methods and design patterns, covering everything from continuous integration and testing to architecture.

dimensions.name: Tools
dimensions.description: A range of software tools, from simple productivity enhancers to comprehensive project solutions, catering to various project needs.

dimensions.name: Platforms & Operations
dimensions.description: Technologies and tools for software and infrastructure operations, including platforms and services for managing and scaling applications.

dimensions.name: Languages & Frameworks
dimensions.description: A selection of programming languages, alongside essential frameworks for building a variety of custom software.

technologies.name: React
technologies.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces with a component-based architecture.
technologies.rationale: React has proven itself as a mature, stable framework with excellent community support and ecosystem.

technologies.name: TypeScript
technologies.description: A strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript.
technologies.rationale: TypeScript provides excellent developer experience with type safety and better tooling.

technologies.name: GraphQL
technologies.description: A query language for APIs and a runtime for fulfilling those queries.
technologies.rationale: GraphQL shows promise for API design but requires careful consideration of complexity vs benefits.

technologies.name: Docker
technologies.description: A platform for developing, shipping, and running applications using containerization.
technologies.rationale: Docker has become essential for consistent deployment and development environments.

technologies.name: AI Coding Assistants
technologies.description: AI-powered tools like GitHub Copilot and ChatGPT for code generation and assistance.
technologies.rationale: Showing significant productivity gains but requires careful evaluation of code quality and security.

technologies.name: Microservices Architecture
technologies.description: An architectural approach that structures an application as a collection of loosely coupled services.
technologies.rationale: Can provide benefits for large teams and complex systems, but adds significant operational complexity.
